SMBus PEC Register

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x34
Size:
0x4

Description

Packet Error Checking value

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:8] reserved r 0x0 Reserved
[7:0] pec rw 0x0 PEC Value

Field Descriptions

reserved - Reserved

Reserved bits

pec - PEC Value

Current/expected PEC value (CRC-8)
